Text: Great stuff. A PDF file so I can see it on my Mac (not only Windows users have the right to read, right) :)
It also works on Windows... (It's a PDF file. Adobe Acrobat Reader can read it).
I *never* said it didn't work on Windows - it's just that most eBooks cannot be read on Macs, and this one can even be read on Amazon Kindle (it's a simple PDF file).
Be gone! you traitorous mac user.
This is 400 pages of the same advert directing you to some sight selling a crappy ebook!
I agree with macaddy. Not worth downloading ppl
